rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C188724

self.title: CDISC DDF Organization Type Value Set Terminology

definition: The terminology relevant to the organization type.
name: Organization Type Value Set Terminology
preferredTerm: CDISC DDF Organization Type Value Set Terminology

terms.definition: An organization (typically a government agency) that administers the registration of studies. (BRIDG)
An entity that is responsible for the initiation, management, and/or financing of a clinical study.

An organization (typically a government agency) that is responsible for implementing and enforcing laws, licensing and regulating products and services, promoting the use of standards, and ensuring safety and consumer protections.
